evidence: Used for database management and analysis in multiple roles including Deutsche Bank AG, Novartis, and Self-Employed projects.
Developed automated applications using Python as evidenced by the Contract Compliance project at Deutsche Bank.
Used in development of backend solutions for various projects including Novartis and Deutsche Bank.
Developed frontend solutions as part of backend/frontend applications at Deutsche Bank.
Worked on generating ontologies and key phrase prediction using machine learning in self-employed projects.
Managed multiple software development projects with Agile methodologies including Deutsche Bank AG and Novartis roles.
Provided automated KPI reporting on involved processes at Deutsche Bank and Novartis.

Managed and negotiated multiple contracts in various roles including Global Sourcing IT Change Management and Governance, Software Licenses and Services Vendor Manager, and Global Lead, Software License Management.
Responsible for negotiating major deals and agreements with vendors in roles including Global Sourcing IT Change Management and Governance, and Global Lead, Software License Management.
Led multiple teams as Team Lead Proof of Entitlement/Contractual Provisions Management, Project lead Contract Compliance/Tech Lead, and Global Sourcing IT Change Management and Governance.
Regularly communicated with stakeholders in roles including Financial Planning and Governance - Software License Management, and Global Lead, Mobile Telecom Demand Management.
Collaborated on multiple projects as a team member or leader, including Deutsche Bank AG, Novartis, and Self-Employed roles.
Managed end-to-end project lifecycles in various roles such as Global Sourcing IT Change Management and Governance, Software Licenses and Services Vendor Manager, and Software Category Manager.
